abilities.name: Troubleshooting
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Special Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, heal 80 damage from it.

attacks.name: Critical Error GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 10 cards and discard them. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
